short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your shopping with PlaceBoost - the smart way to shop online!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PlaceBoost: Transform Your Viewing into Shopping! This cutting-edge Chrome extension not only identifies products in real-time videos but also provides direct purchase links. Experience the ultimate convenience of spotting and shopping your favorite items from any video, all with a simple click. Shop effortlessly with PlaceBoost!
